page.title: 08Farming_ General Description
page.content: This is a fertile farming area with vertually no uncultivable land. There are l6 farms in the block of which 3 are in the village of Hook Norton and 4 are in Great Rollright village. The largest farm is about 7OO acres. The smallest (no longer operated as a farm) is 4 acres and l farm is now amalgated with another outside the block. There are 5 under lOO acres and 3 over 3OO acres. Some farmers rent more land. The median acreage is 223. There are 4 dairy farms, 6 mixed farms(arable\store cattle\sheep or dairy), 1 pig specialist(also arable) and 1 arable only. There was 1 farm with a horticultural bias and 3 where sheep were kept. One was now a holiday home. Only 3 of the farms have changed hands in the last 1O years.
